description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts that relate to the taxonomy language found in either the HITRUST Threat Catalogue or the ENISA Threat Taxonomy.
name: OSRS Operational Framewrok - Organizationl Threat
source: HITRUST Threat Catalogue and the ENISA Threat Taxonomy

values.description: The process of resolving a legal dispute between two or more parties (individuals or business entities) who seek compensation for damages incurred or specific performances that were not delivered.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Organizationl Threat: HITRUST OCC1 Civil

values.description: Threat of finacial or legal penatly or lost of trust of customers and collaborators due to violation of law or regulations.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Organizationl Threat: ENISA Violation of Laws or Regulations OR Breach of Legislation
